Package com.vividsolutions.jump.algorithm

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Densifier
    Inser vertices every x units along linear components of a Geometry.
    LengthSubstring
    Computes a substring of a LineString between given distances along the line.
    LengthToPoint
    Computes the length along a LineString to the point on the line nearest a given point.
    LocatePoint
    Provides various ways of computing the actual value of a point a given length along a line.
    VertexHausdorffDistance
    Implements algorithm for computing a distance metric which can be thought of as the "Vertex Hausdorff Distance".
    VertexHausdorffDistance.MaxPointDistanceFilter
